episode.title: Edward J. DeBartolo Corporation v. Florida Gulf Coast Building & Construction Trades Council

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: The Debartolo case is here from the Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit and for the reasons as stated in the opinion that has been filed, the judgment of the Court of Appeals is affirmed.
Justices O'Connor and Scalia concur in the judgment and Justice Kennedy took no part in the consideration or decision of the case.
